Articles.Content:
I don't know about anyone else, but the explosion sounds for me are obnoxiously loud. Why is this?

So a slider for that effect would be nice not to mention even more segregated sound sliders. Every major sound should have it's own adjustment instead of being lumped together under "sound fx". Squads not the only violator of this. It's very rare I find a game with good audio adjustments.

I eagerly look forward to the day when I dont have to mute my volume just before impact.

Edited June 27, 2015 by Motokid600
